mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM, user_num, user_fnm, user_lnm, user_city, interest, hopecity FROM (SELECT u.user_num, u.user_fnm, u.user_lnm, u.user_city, i.interest as interest, h.hope_city as hopecity FROM user_tb u left outer join interest_tb i ON u.user_num = i.user_num left outer join travle_hope h ON u.user_num = h.user_num ORDER BY u.user_num DESC)) WHERE RNUM between #{firstRow} and #{endRow}
